resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82707</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82707</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>4743</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Toni e semitoni</string>
            <string language="en">Whole and half steps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ganzes und halbe Jobsteps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Totalité et demi d'étapes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Todo e meias etapas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ολόκληρα και μισά βήματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conjunto y medios pasos de progresión</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Sperimenta con toni e semitoni! Scopri quale è il loro suono, dove sono situati e come sono connotati.</string>
            <string language="en">Experiment with whole and half steps! Find out how they sound, where they are placed and how they are notated.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">teoria musicale</string>
            <string language="en">music theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>networked</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment mit den vollständigen und halben 
Jobsteps! Finden Sie heraus, wie sie klingen, wo sie plaziert 
werden und wie sie sind, notated.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérience avec d'étapes entières et demi ! 
Découvrez comment elles retentissent, où elles sont placées 
et comment ils sont notated.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência com etapas inteiras e meias! 
Encontre para fora como soam, onde são colocados e como são 
notated.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα με ολόκληρα και τα μισά βήματα! 
Ανακαλύψτε πώς ηχούν, όπου τοποθετούνται και πώς είναι.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Experimento con pasos de progresión enteros y 
medios! Descubra cómo suenan, donde se colocan y cómo son 
notated.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musiktheorie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">théorie de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teoria da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θεωρία μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">teoría de la música</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </contribute>

          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>drill and practice</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>exploration</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>learner</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">10-17</string>
            <string language="en">10-17</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Il discente può fare esperimenti con toni e semitoni, trovare quale sia il loro suono, dove sono situati sulla tastiera e come sono connotati.</string>
            <string language="en">The learner may experiment with the whole and the half steps, find out how they sound, where they are placed on the keyboard and how they are notated.</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
